src:
水果燕菜果凍蛋糕 實在太美太誘人了（視頻）

04 Nov 2019, 02:35

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月04日訊】美到不捨得吃
Ingredient 材料 :Transparent Part 透明部分:Water 1200ml 清水 1200毫升Caster sugar 130g 細砂糖 130克Agar powder 4tsp 燕菜粉 4茶匙Jelly powder 1tsp 果凍粉 1茶匙
White part 白色部分:Coconut milk 400ml 椰漿 400毫升Water 500ml 清水 500毫升Caster sugar 100g 細砂糖 100克Agar powder 3tsp 燕菜粉 3茶匙Jelly powder 3/4tsp 果凍粉 3/4茶匙
*1tsp=2.64g 1茶匙=2.64克
Other 其它 :Strawberry 草莓Kiwi fruit 奇異果Peach in syrup 罐頭桃子Blueberry 藍莓
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/04/a102699542.html
text:
Fruit Yancai Jelly Cake is too beautiful and tempting (video)

04 Nov 2019, 02:35

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 04, 2019] Beauty is not willing to eat
Ingredient Material : Transparent Part Transparent part: Water 1200ml Water 1200ml Caster sugar 130g Fine sugar 130g Agar powder 4tsp Yancai powder 4 teaspoons Jelly powder 1tsp Jelly powder 1 teaspoon
White part White part: Coconut milk 400ml Coconut milk 400ml Water 500ml Clear water 500ml Caster sugar 100g Fine sugar 100g Agar powder 3tsp Yancai powder 3 teaspoons Jelly powder 3/4tsp Jelly powder 3/4 teaspoon
*1tsp=2.64g 1 teaspoon = 2.64g
Other Other :Strawberry Kiwi fruit Kiwi fruit Peach in syrup Canned peach Blueberry Blueberry
The following YouTube video demo:
